notes: Official Hindi remake of Coke Studio's "Pasoori" released by T-Series" ; injunctions led to removals on YouTube/OTT/streaming in Nov 2022; dispute later settled and Kerala HC quashed the case (Oct 2023).
Official Bollywood remake of the 1996 hit from the movie 'Tere Mere Sapne'
Unlicensed copy; Thaikkudam Bridge title hit from the album Navarasa reused as Varaha Roopam in the movie Kantara (2022).
T-Series licensed remake for movie Satyamev Jayate (2018); benchmark for licensed remakes.
Manasilaayo (2023) features Malaysia Vasudevan's AI-generated vocals, used by Anirudh Ravichander. Original recordings sourced from Vasudevan's past recordings.
Composer Anu Malik of the original song alleged that Pritam, composer of the new song, was an unauthorized copy.
Official licensed remix of composer Ilaiyaraja's song from the movie Aa Rathri (1982), used in the movie Lokah.
Official licensed remix of composer Oussepachan's hit song from the movie Kaathodu Kaathoram (1985), used in the movie Nna Thaan Case Kondu (2022).

Anu Malik publicly alleged that composer Pritam copied his song "Mohabbat Naam Hai". Malik threatened legal action, but never pursued a case. This is a public, unresolved claim within Bollywood's major-label ecosystem.

Kalyana Vayaasu, composed by Anirudh Ravichander, was accused of being a copy of the melodies "Western track 'Don't Lie'. Following the allegations, the song was temporarily removed from YouTube and later re-uploaded with a revised version. This is a great example of modern algorithmic takedown and visibility recovery scenario."
Guitar riff similarity between Last Resort and Bulleya; though it was discussed at the time of the song's release, no court case was put up.
Fans noted melodic similarity between Kesariya (Brahmastra, 2022) and 'Laree Chootee (Ek Chalis Ki Last Local, 2007); no formal complaint or legal action filed.
Official licensed remix of composer Ilaiyaraja's song from the movie Karakatakaran (1990), used in the movie The Greatest of All Time (2023).
Thimiri Yezhuda (2023) features the late vocalist Shahul Hameed's AI-generated vocals, sampled from the song Raasathi.
